name: User Research Cannot Exist Without Study Design
description:
The presentation I gave at the Grace Hopper Celebration 2020.


User research is more than just the data collection method--A/B testing, interviews, and usability testing are only half the story. This talk explores the less obvious half: study design, the framework for data collection. Without study design, we are not delivering people-relevant, high-impact findings. Listeners will learn six takeaways that they can start applying to their research tomorrow.
